author: Pierluigi Paganini
description: Experts found two vulnerabilities in the vBulletin forum software, one of which is already being exploited in real-world attacks. Two critical vBulletin flaws, tracked as CVE-2025-48827 and CVE-2025-48828, enable API abuse and remote code execution. The experts warn that one of these flaws is actively exploited in the wild. An unauthenticated user could exploit CVE-2025-48827 […]
title: Two flaws in vBulletin forum software are under attack

title: SECURITY AFFAIRS MALWARE NEWSLETTER ROUND 47

author: Pierluigi Paganini

title: Security Affairs newsletter Round 526 by Pierluigi Paganini – INTERNATIONAL EDITION
